page.title: 16Adult Recreation in E/Calder
page.content: There are few sports in East Calder except bowling and football. We have to travel to other places.We swim in Livingston and Broxburn,play golf in Whitburn,Livingston and Pumpherston, and football in Edinburgh. There are very few clubs in East Calder.We travel to Livingston for chess and Mid Calder for keep fit. There is going to be a sewing club soon. We already have Young Wives and Woman's Guild.There are two bowling clubs. We also have a pigeon club in Oakbank which is open every night. People take homing pigeons and swap them or talk about them. Some people would like more to do in East Calder.Suggestions are a chess club,yoga,cinema,theatre and music groups.One adult thinks that people here are apathetic about organising activities for themselves.
